title: No Objection Certificate from the officer at Divisional level, Water Resources Department in respect of lands falling in ―Command Area‖ of any Irrigation Project unless these powers are exercisable by the higher authority
clause_text: No Objection Certificate from the officer at Divisional level, Water Resources Department in respect of lands falling in ―Command Area‖ of any Irrigation Project unless these powers are exercisable by the higher authority. Village maps showing the lands falling in the project.
section: Permission and Declaration of Project by State Government :-
